website_summaries.verdict: Made from a lightweight and breathable material, the Charged Bandit 3 is a comfortable running shoe that is recommended for both beginners and seasoned runners. It aims to deliver a consistent performance no matter the distance. While some may not be satisfied by the traction and support it offers, most users will find this a reliable option.
pros: Many users said that the upper material was lightweight and extremely breathable
The shoe provided a secure fit and a great overall foot support, according to some runners
A majority of buyers commented that the shoe was comfortable
Several users were satisfied that the color options available were pleasing to the eyes
The lightweight nature and the agreeable heel cushioning received positive feedback
cons: Several reviewers thought the midsole was lacking in arch support
There was not enough traction on wet trails, as observed by some runners
Several buyers agreed that the toe box is narrow and uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: Size was extremely off compared to other UA runners.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the shoes didn't fit. I have 3 pairs of Under Armour runners, all size 10, so when I saw that most agree that sizing was 'normal' I was confident they would fit. When I tried them on, I thought I may have ordered the wrong size by mistake. They actually felt like they were two sizes too small. I'll order them again in a larger size soon and hopefully be able to review them then. Because you have to provide a star rating, I'll just go with 3 for now as they were constructed well, looked really nice, were very light, and we're very price friendly. Looking forward to trying them out.
customer_reviews.author: SportsFan6541

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Look good, feel good, light weight and included an optional set of lime green laces
customer_reviews.author: Melanie T

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just not the same quality I'm used to from under armour. Owned 3.5 months, and switch between this pair and another for general office work. These have just not held up. I'm not a runner or fitness junky as I like beer, bacon, and beef; but I'm not overweight trying to squeeze sausages into these shoes either (dad bod model). Outer material frays where it flexes and rubber tread is coming unglued. I'll continue to use UA, but steering clear of this line and material.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought under armor would make a good shoe, wrong. My teen son needs wide shoes which are hard to find in the store. So I ordered these. The fabric begin fraying within two weeks, within a month of daily wear the shoes were toast. He’s never had a problem with shoes not lasting before, guess these are just a really bad idea
customer_reviews.author: A. Barbaree

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing from UA.  Painful design.
customer_reviews.text: The back of the shoe is completely without padding. I wore them for about an hour and the literally cut the back of both of my ankles. Very painful indeed. I have six pairs of UA shoes and they are all just marvelous but these were designed by Joseph Mengele.
customer_reviews.author: C. Miracle

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at a nice price!
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe but I use them as my daily shoes since they are light and confortable. At first the shoes seems a bit narrow but after about a week they seem to fit my feet perfect now. Would recommend these shoes to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Tang

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a nice light running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a nice light running shoe. Way too small though. Had to return them. First time I ever ordered a Size 12 and found them way too small. Go up half a size at least.
customer_reviews.author: Cudgel

customer_reviews.title: Guilty as charged!
customer_reviews.text: Charged with a very comfortable sock like smugness. Great cushioning. Not overly squishy. Good road feel and fast transitioning. Runs a half size small (had to return 1st pair). I run two 5k's a week for fitness. I really like these shoes. The look sleek too.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 1 month?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for only a month now and only wear them a few days a week.... The rubber sole is already separating from the the bottom back of the shoe! Very disappointing as I have many pairs of Under Armour shoes but the quality keeps getting worst.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: I like the the quality and durability , last long to worn-out .
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoes for all purpose .... in the Gym, walking, running , etc. Very comfortable and light to wear this shoes .”Under Armour”a brand for all work out activities .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty slick kicks there bud
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, love the look and feel. I run half marathons, only reason for 4 stars is they wear the skin on the back of my heel pretty bad after running but I probably just need to wear higher socks.
customer_reviews.author: 570 south square drive apt. 1 winterville nc 28590

customer_reviews.title: I've only moderately ran on a treadmill so far but they're comfortable and a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded after using my Free runs 4.0 for over 2 years. I've only moderately ran on a treadmill so far but they're comfortable and a good fit. I'd recommend these
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Very light with good responsiveness. Would not recommend if you run on wet surfaces. Bottom of shoe a little hard so feels slippery when on wet asphalt or concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are ok shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes for work, where the material is around the laces near toe is not made well and hurts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft soles
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes and will buy more, the only down fall is you would have to wear bandaids behind your ankle because the shoe rubs against the back of your ankle.
customer_reviews.author: esm

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Breathes well, good cushioning, and traction. Have yo ve careful to take the shoes on and off because of its mesh fabric
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Am kind of between a 12 and a 13 in size. Read that these run a bit small. I got a 13 and it fits perfect! Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Light and comfortable. I weigh 220 lbs and run about 20 miles a week. These shoes perform as well as more expensive Brooks running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size and very comfortable. Good cheap running shoes if you don’t need ...
customer_reviews.text: True to size and very comfortable. Good cheap running shoes if you don’t need motion control. Feel every bit as good as my last pair of running shoes at 1/2 the price.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, an excellent shoe. One thing: I wouldn’t use the last shoelace loop. I developed a nasty case of tendinitis using that last loop. I liked the shoe a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Says they are really light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband. He loves them!!! Says they are really light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LCS

customer_reviews.title: #winner
customer_reviews.text: WAS a Nike fan until I tried this shoe. Personally find this way more comfortable to run in. I usually wear a 10.5, ordered a 10.5, fits like a 10.5. The foot support is great. Price is way more legit. #winner
customer_reviews.author: Patricio

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: After one month of use for running (2 miles 4-5x weekly), the outside of the vamp got symmetrical holes on both shoes. They were comfortable while they lasted, but they wear out very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was a little too small in the toe, but it broke in easily and I love this shoe for my runs.
customer_reviews.author: Will Valentin

customer_reviews.title: Sizing runs small
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, but I had to go up a full size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Scottna

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are great! I own a few pairs of this style
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great! I own a few pairs of this style. They fit perfect and are very comfortable. Fast shipping. I do have to get a half size larger than my normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy one size larger than normal.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. But did notice the size run a little small.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I bought half size bigger and it was still too tight. Need to get full size bigger than you normally wear for running sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Neiko Roman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are a little narrow and was not available in wide.
customer_reviews.author: Keith B.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand. Always fits right. Always has the size I need in the styles I like. Which is a big deal since I’m a size 15.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot and these shoes are far too wide at the front of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Williams

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sole is not as soft it is expected from UA.
customer_reviews.author: Parth

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Overall I liked the look and style of the shoe but it runs entirely too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Charged Bandit 3 Running Shoes Man
product_meta.description: NEUTRAL: for those looking for the right balance between flexibility and cushioning The innovative Under Armour Speed Form structure shapes itself on the foot for a precise fit, eliminating any distraction The fully knitted upper offers flexible support and complete comfort Balanced external buttress for greater support and stability of the back of the foot High-capacity melded EVA midsole for a comfortable and responsive ride Charged Cushioning insole uses compression melded foam for even greater responsiveness and durability, ensuring perfect cushioning and optimal energy efficiency The sturdy rubber sole protects high impact areas for longer life with less weight The anatomically positioned flexible grooves offer adequate flexibility in the essential points Differential: 8 mm Weight: 8.55 oz. / 240 g
feature_bullets: The innovative Under Armour Speed Form structure shapes itself on the foot for a precise fit, eliminating any distraction
The fully knitted upper offers flexible support and complete comfort
Balanced external buttress for greater support and stability of the back of the foot
High-capacity melded EVA midsole for a comfortable and responsive ride
Charged Cushioning insole ensure perfect cushioning and optimal energy efficiency
